* Mad Max: Fury Road (2015) - Set in a post-apocalyptic world, this movie follows Max Rockatansky (Tom Hardy) as he teams up with Imperator Furiosa (Charlize Theron) to take down the tyrannical Immortan Joe. With its stunning visuals, heart-pumping action sequences, and empowering female lead, it's a thrilling ride that you won't want to miss!
